titleStmt.title: A second letter concerning toleration
titleStmt.author: Locke, John, 1632-1704.
Proast, Jonas. Argument of the letter concerning toleration.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Awnsham and John Churchill ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by John Locke in reply to Jonas Proast's The argument of the letter concerning toleration. Cf. BLC.
Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
